ygData.subject: Re: Roll Call
ygData.msgSnippet: Kelethin is ok, but Caladium Rocks!!   Buy a back pack full of sketches in Kelethin and run to Kaladim (there are no sketches in Kaladim).   You can run from
ygData.messageBody:
Kelethin is ok, but Caladium Rocks!! Buy a back pack full of sketches in Kelethin
and run to Kaladim (there are no sketches in Kaladim). You can run from the potting
wheel to the vender who sells clay faster than you can run accross a single platform
in Kelethin... I hear Neriak and Halas have similar arrangements...

Paul Kundrat wrote:

> From: Paul Kundrat <krat@...>
>
> Well, gosh darn!
>
> If my apprentice Sparky is here, then so am I! Master potter and keeper of one of
> the best trade secrets (pottery) in EQ.
> Kelethin is my city of choice to work my art of pottery in and i will be glad to
> help any other aspiring potters out there.
>
> Synsaxus SoulScorcher(even lazier Wizard) Tunare
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to online communities.
